Text.val: 21.04.2014 GB SCR18846 Changed value of update the TMPL_DEBITCREDITCHECK from N to Y
15.05.2013 SH SCR18138 Changed range on LGCC_DATE = LGCC_DATE to >= LGCC_DATE of current row (second LGCC selection)
10.04.2013 SH SCR18072 Step 2: Added Select/Update CMON; Added module "Recalculations (Transaction)"
15.03.2013 SH SCR18017 Step 1: Added range LGCH_PROGID <> BAD011 <> BAD022 <> BAD025; Added
-- Step 1 is perforemd with transaction level on selected LGCH row
-- The recalculations are performed within one transaction (Info: BPH107 has to be called at the end)
... descending sort on CUHA to get max(CUHA_STARTDATE)
-- These following updates are necessary because the ledger bookings of the current day are already booked
against the last rate and should not be booked again via BAD011
